Our licensed plumbers will assess the water conditions, infrastructure, and existing grease traps to determine the best course of action. We'll then clean your grease trap to ensure it meets local code requirements and is working properly. Our dispatch times are fast, ensuring you get the help you need quickly, especially during heavy rainfall events.

service_area_section.h2: Grease Trap Cleaning in Katy, TX & Surrounding Areas
service_area_section.body: We serve the Katy TX area, including ZIP codes 77493, 77494, and 77491. Our plumbers are familiar with the local geography and can quickly respond to emergencies in nearby cities like Cinco Ranch, Brookshire, and Fulshear.
